::Slayer/Prowl::

Being out of range of the defences of the Cybertronian Fire, Slayer 
fires another missile. He hoped they'd respond soon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl spins around as a missile hits the CF. He growls. 

-Love, the base is under attack,- he thinks to Iron Raptor, -Do you 
want us to engage the enemy or wait for them to get closer?-



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
>    Megaton had landed a few miles outside Maximal territory, he 
wasn't ready to quit trying  for his destiny. When the other 
Predacons saw how he got the Maximals to side with him they'd have to 
accept him as leader. He heard what sounded like thunder in the 
distance. He  placed his clawed hand over his spark, "Thank You" he 
said to whatever diety was responsible for such a stroke of luck. 
>   He transformed to dragon mode and flew back towards the CF.
